titles.title: Oglala Sioux Tribe Angostura Irrigation Project Modernization and Development Act
To enhance and provide to the Oglala Sioux Tribe and Angostura Irrigation Project certain benefits of the Pick-Sloan Missouri River basin program.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E290)
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.
